component.summary: Sil-Q is a computer role-playing game with a strong emphasis on discovery and tactical combat

description.p: Sil-Q is a computer role-playing game with a strong emphasis on discovery and tactical combat. It has a simple but rich combat system which allows for a great variety of choice.
Sil-Q continues the development of Sil which hasn't been updated for a while.
